description: T.1 Sycamore - Fell (dead).T.2 Prunus - 2.5m Lateral reduction over garden.T.3 Lime - 1.5m Lateral reduction from lamp column, 2.5m lateral reduction from house, 20% crown thin, crown lift to 5m from ground level & remove ivy.T.4 Sycamore - Crown lift to 4m from ground level.T.5 Yew - Fell (in decline).
